00036 void DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(string & inStr)
00037 {
00038         // Remove leading whitespaces.
00039         size_t pos;
00040         pos = inStr.find_first_not_of(" \t\f\v\n\r");
00041         inStr = inStr.substr(pos);    // get the string after that position.
00042 }

00051 void DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(string & inStr)
00052 {
00053         // Erase trailing whitespaces.
00054         string whitespaces (" \t\f\v\n\r");
00055         size_t found;
00056 
00057         found = inStr.find_last_not_of(whitespaces);
00058         if (found != string::npos)
00059                 inStr.erase(found + 1);
00060         else
00061                 inStr.clear();            // inStr is all whitespace
00062 }
